jump_scares.spoiler: The killer appears behind Mabel and attacks her
Mabel’s decomposing head falls out of the clothes dryer
Happy opens the door once more and this time the real killer is standing behind it
The killer grabs Dave’s head as he tends to a boiling pot
Miner coveralls drop from the ceiling startling Sylvia
A corpse drops down in front of Sylvia
Hollis yells out “BOO” to scare Sarah and Patty
Howard drops down from above Hollis to scare the group
Hollis’ bloodied head appears from around a corner startling Howard
As Sarah and Patty climb the ladder, a corpse suddenly drops from above them
The killer appears in front of Sarah and Patty
